instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
PP3v3_s5_ssd is present
PP1v8_ssd_cold not present
PP3v3_2v7_nand_vcc not present 
PP1v2_ssd_cold not presen
The costomer said the system Freez while he using it and he did a force shutdown. The problem started.

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
What about other J9600 voltages?
Start checking pins 2 & 44.

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
PPVIN_2V7NAND_LB  not present
PP5V_S4_P2V7NAND_LB not present

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
I hope you've checked with J9600 metal plate in place.
If the corresponding voltages from left side (reffered to schematic) are present, then J9600 has bad contacts.

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message: I have replaced J9600, still no ssd voltages

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message: Are the mentioned volatges present on left side?

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message: just noticed u3100 is extremely hot, and board still draws 20V, and the processor is also pretty warmed up. I couldn't continue because the u3100 area was too hot. My question now is how can we have a bad CD3215 chip and board still draws 20V and processor still able to start up?? this is the very first time I'm see this!!!

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
Why do you bother with USB-C, once board is booted?
So dificult to find why voltages from left J9600 don't pass to right side???
How much time do you need to check them?
I bet U3100, or other chip don't have time to burn; if you do your job right.

BTW, U3100 stil gets hot, if you connect charger on other port?

threads.title: 820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
820-00239-A folder sign on screen no ssd
threads.message:
Then change it.

BTW, any news about J9600 voltages???
